title: Kombu Dashi (Vegetarian Dashi)
directions: Gently clean the dashi kombu with a damp cloth but leave the white powdery substance (Mannitol) which contribute to the umami flavor in dashi. Do not wash the kombu! I usually look at the kombu carefully to make sure it's clean, then I use it right away.
Make a couple of slits on the kombu.
ingredients: 1 oz kombu (dried kelp) (1 oz = 30 grams or 4" x 6")
